name: Monkeyslide
description:
It's sliding time!

Featuring the adorable monkeys from Orisinal.
Simply touch the screen to join the poles and get the monkeys to slide down. Separate the poles to avoid incoming bombs.

And don't forget to grab the bananas!

****************

- Green star bonus gives monkeys some oranges to throw. It's time to fight back!
- Purple star bonus gives you special magnetic poles that keeps a gap to allow passing bombs.

****************
